content.rendered:
Smile CARE Dental Clinic A personalized approach to creating the perfect smile Book an Appointment Smile Dental Clinic A healthy smile and better well being, all start at Smile Care Dental Clinic Book an Appointment

Dental Check-Up

A complete oral exam to detect cavities, gum issues, and abnormalities for long-term dental health.

Scaling & Bleaching

Deep cleaning and teeth whitening to remove stains, plaque, and improve your smile’s brightness.

Dental Radiography
(RVG X-Rays)

Digital X-rays provide accurate imaging for early diagnosis of cavities, bone loss, and hidden issues.

Intraoral Scanner
(3D Digital Impressions)

Captures precise 3D images of teeth and gums for crowns, bridges, and aligners—no messy molds.

Read More

Dental Implant

Titanium implants replace missing teeth and fuse with the jawbone for stable, long-lasting support.

Basal Implant

Ideal for low bone density, basal implants anchor in strong basal bone for immediate, stable restoration.

R.C.T. (Root Canal Treatment)

Removes infected pulp to relieve pain, preserve the tooth, and restore long-term oral health.

Extraction & Disimpaction

Safe removal of problematic or impacted teeth to relieve pain, infection, and crowding.

Removable Partial/Complete Denture

Cost-effective, removable dentures that restore missing teeth function and aesthetics. Custom full-mouth dentures that improve chewing, speech, and appearance for edentulous patients.

E-Max, Zirconia, Ceramic & Metal Crowns

Durable and aesthetic crowns available in E-Max, zirconia, ceramic, or metal for tooth restoration.

Read More

Smile Makeover

Enhance your smile with a custom blend of veneers, bonding, implants, and whitening.

Orthodontia & Invisalign (Clear Aligners)

Straighten teeth discreetly and comfortably with removable Invisalign clear aligners.

Composite Fillings & Restoration

Tooth-colored composite materials restore chipped or decayed teeth with a natural look.

Painless Pedodontia (Pediatric Dentistry)

Gentle, pain-free dental treatments for children using modern anesthesia techniques.

Dental Jewellery (Tooth Gems)

Add a stylish sparkle to your smile with safe, semi-permanent tooth gems.

Read More

About the Dentist

Dr. Dhaval Shah, B.D.S

Dr. Krishna Patel, B.D.S

With over 15 years of clinical and teaching experience, Dr. Dhaval Shah brings advanced dental expertise and compassionate care to Smile Dental Clinic. A BDS graduate from the renowned Government Dental College & Hospital, Ahmedabad, Dr. Shah has trained extensively in orthodontics and has served as a senior dental tutor at Shree Krishna Hospital, Karamsad, for over a decade. Known for his precision, ethical practice, and patient-first approach, Dr. Shah is committed to delivering personalized, high-quality dental care.

Dr. Krishna Patel is a trusted dental professional with over 7 years of experience in delivering personalized, high-quality dental care. A BDS graduate from Narsinhbhai Patel Dental College, Visnagar, she specializes in preventive, restorative, and cosmetic dentistry. Known for her gentle touch and patient-focused approach, Dr. Patel is committed to making every visit comfortable while helping patients achieve a healthy, confident smile. She stays updated with the latest advancements to ensure the best care at Smile Dental Clinic.
